svg: <path d="M12 3c-3 0-5 2-6 4s-1 5 0 7 3 3 6 3 5-1 6-3 1-5 0-7-3-4-6-4z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5"/> <circle cx="9" cy="11" r="1" fill="currentColor"/> <circle cx="15" cy="11" r="1" fill="currentColor"/> <path d="M10 14c.5.5 1.5.5 2 .5s1.5 0 2-.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <path d="M8 5l-2-3M16 5l2-3" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <path d="M7 18l-2 3M17 18l2 3" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/>
